item.title: FG Financial Group Inc S-1
item.description: FG Financial Group Inc, which is in the Fire, Marine & Casualty Insurance [6331] industry, SEC S-1 filing on October 05, 2021 had 17138 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: rights - 604 instances subscription - 547 instances stock - 411 instances common - 322 instances shares - 316 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
